Text:
[II] Beloved siblings, let us pled to our Lord Jesus Christ, who judges the living and the dead, saying:
[IR] Come, Lord Jesus!
[I1] Lord Christ, who came to save sinners,
[I2] protect us from each path that lead to temptation.
[I1] We believe You will return unmistakably for the Judgement,
[I2] reveal in us the power of Your salvation.
[I1] Grant us, by the power of the Spirit, to keep the teachings of Your law,
[I2] that, in charity, we may greet Your coming.
[I1] You, who are blessed forever, through Your mercy grant us that we may live faithful and somber lives in our times,
[I2] anticipating the blessed hope, and the arrival of Your splendor.
Changes: 2022-12-06 - Paul Prins: Initial translation of these intentions.
